base_description: Oval sunglasses with white frame and dark lenses.
part_description: Two oval lenses, white frame, thin temples with curved ends, symmetrical arrangement.
internal_interaction_description: The lenses are held in place by the oval frame, which connects to the temples at the hinges. The temples extend from the frame, curving at the ends to fit over the ears, ensuring stability and comfort.
external_interaction_description: Designed to be worn on the face, the sunglasses shield eyes from sunlight. The lenses reduce glare, enhancing vision in bright conditions, while the frame rests on the nose and ears, providing a secure fit.
